definition: a timepiece that shows the time of day, to measure the time or duration of an event or action or the person who performs an action in a certain period of time
details:
noun
- a timepiece that shows the time of day
verb
- to measure the time or duration of an event or action or the person who performs an action in a certain period of time
= example: to measure the time or duration of an event or action or the person who performs an action in a certain period of time
= synonyms: time
